duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide a variety of pediatric nursing services to adolescents in a psychiatric residential treatment center.
Conduct in-service training for staff on health care topics.
Provide medication management and direct care, supervision, and behavior interventions to clients on assigned shifts.
Operate within established guidelines, legal requirements, standing orders from an M.D., licensing, and professional standards of medical practices.

education_certification.credential: Registered Nurse license in Oregon (Bachelor's in nursing preferred)
